rules.title: Visualize Casting in the Mold for Proper Filling and Solidification
rules.engineering_intent: Ensure the geometry allows predictable mold filling and solidification without isolated heavy masses.

checklist_items.text: No isolated heavy sections without visible feeding paths
Section changes are visually traceable across the geometry
Overall geometry allows clear understanding of mold fill direction

rules.ai_guidance: Look for bulky regions connected by thin necks or walls that may solidify last and remain unfed.

rules.title: Design for Directional Solidification to Prevent Shrinkage Porosity
rules.engineering_intent: Promote progressive solidification toward feeding zones to avoid shrinkage.

checklist_items.text: Wall thickness increases progressively toward heavier sections
Heaviest sections appear suitable for riser placement
No reverse thickness gradients that could trap shrinkage

rules.ai_guidance: Identify whether thick sections are downstream of thinner sections in the solidification path.

rules.title: Avoid Sharp Corners and Angles to Eliminate Hot Spots
rules.engineering_intent: Prevent hot spots, stress concentration, and poor metal flow at junctions.

checklist_items.text: No sharp internal corners at section junctions
External corners are eased or rounded
Junctions do not visually concentrate excess material

rules.ai_guidance: Sharp re-entrant corners often appear darker or thicker in images and are common hot-spot locations.

rules.title: Minimize Intersecting Sections at Junctions
rules.engineering_intent: Reduce hot spots caused by multiple sections meeting at a single junction.

checklist_items.text: No more than two major sections intersect at a single junction
Intersecting sections are staggered where possible
Complex junctions show visible relief or blending

rules.ai_guidance: T, X, and star-shaped junctions are high-risk unless staggered or relieved.

rules.title: Maintain Uniform Wall Thickness for Even Cooling
rules.engineering_intent: Ensure even cooling and prevent thinner sections from being starved by thicker ones.

checklist_items.text: Wall thickness appears uniform across the casting
No abrupt thick-to-thin wall transitions
Heavily thick sections are avoided or visually relieved

rules.ai_guidance: Visually inspect for sudden wall thickening or bulky pads attached to thin walls.

rules.title: Proportion Inner Walls and Cored Regions to Avoid Slow Cooling
rules.engineering_intent: Avoid slow-cooling internal masses that cause strength variation and porosity.

checklist_items.text: Inner walls appear thinner than or comparable to outer walls
No excessive internal metal buildup around cores
Thin internal cavities are avoided where impractical

rules.ai_guidance: Deep internal pockets with thick surrounding walls are common shrinkage risk areas.

rules.title: Fillet Sharp Angles to Reduce Stress and Cracking
rules.engineering_intent: Reduce stress concentration, cracking, and hot spots while improving moldability.

checklist_items.text: Internal corners have visible fillets
Fillets are consistent across similar junctions
No knife-edge or feather-thin features present

rules.ai_guidance: Uniform filleting improves both structural integrity and casting soundness.

rules.title: Avoid Abrupt Section Changes Using Tapers or Radii
rules.engineering_intent: Prevent porosity and stress caused by sudden thickness variation.

checklist_items.text: Thickness transitions are gradual and blended
No sudden step changes between adjoining sections
Tapered or radiused transitions are used where needed

rules.ai_guidance: Abrupt steps often appear as sharp visual discontinuities in section depth.

rules.title: Design Ribs and Brackets for Stiffness Without Hot Spots
rules.engineering_intent: Increase stiffness without creating hot spots or feeding difficulties.

checklist_items.text: Ribs are used to stiffen rather than thicken walls
Ribs do not intersect in complex cross patterns
Ribs blend smoothly into the main casting

rules.ai_guidance: Excessive rib intersections and thick rib bases commonly create hot spots.

rules.title: Minimize Bosses, Lugs, and Pads to Reduce Localized Shrinkage
rules.engineering_intent: Reduce localized heavy masses that cause shrinkage and machining issues.

checklist_items.text: Bosses and pads are minimized or blended smoothly
No isolated thick bosses attached to thin walls
Boss geometry allows practical machining

rules.ai_guidance: Standalone pads and bosses are frequent sources of shrinkage and poor surface quality.

rules.title: Provide Adequate Draft for Pattern Withdrawal
rules.engineering_intent: Ensure safe pattern withdrawal and avoid mold damage.

checklist_items.text: External vertical faces appear to include draft
Internal pockets and cavities appear drafted

rules.ai_guidance: Vertical walls without taper are difficult to withdraw from sand molds.

rules.title: Limit Surface Finish and Marking Expectations to Casting Capability
rules.engineering_intent: Ensure surface finish expectations match casting capability.

checklist_items.text: Tight surface finish expectations appear limited to machined areas
Cast text and logos are readable and not overly thin
No cosmetic requirements on hidden or non-functional surfaces

rules.ai_guidance: As-cast sand surfaces are inherently rough; cosmetic precision should be limited.
